alert.note: Alert for Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 1:44PM EST until January 13 at 1:36AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of upstate South Carolina, including the following counties, Laurens, Spartanburg and Union SC. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EST. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 139 PM EST, Enoree River levels will remain elevated into this evening so remain wary of high water conditions along the river until the river returns to within it`s banks tonight. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
